modifications.description: Created agent memory configuration file
Created session chat history tracking file
Created file modification history tracking file
Created TypeScript utility library for agent memory management with functions for logging chats, file modifications, and retrieving history
Created CLI tool for viewing and managing agent memory (summary, chats, modifications, sessions)
Created comprehensive documentation for agent memory system including usage examples and API reference
Added optional agent memory files to gitignore (commented out by default)
Created example file demonstrating various agent memory integration patterns
Created quick reference guide for agent memory system
Added npm scripts for memory management (memory:summary, memory:chats, memory:mods, memory:sessions)

Created comprehensive AI agent context guide with project overview, tech stack, architecture patterns, file structure, API routes, database schema, state management, and development guidelines (33,849 characters)
Created permanent working instructions for agent: Indonesianâ†’English translation protocol, full trust mode, minimal explanations, session persistence
Updated memory config to include working instructions reference with language and trust settings
Comprehensive local development to Vercel deployment guide with setup, optimization tips, checklist, and time estimates
Vercel ignore file to exclude agent memory, scripts, and docs from deployment for faster builds
Minimal environment variables template for quick local development setup
Automated setup script for faster local development initialization
Added deployment scripts (deploy:preview, deploy:prod), type-check:watch, and prebuild hook
Created environment configuration with CSRF secret and minimal setup for local development
Made ENCRYPTION_KEY optional to allow development without BYOK features, added proper null checks
Removed unused parameters (model, isAuthenticated) from LogUserMessageParams to fix lint errors
Created configuration validation script to check environment setup before starting development
Added Turbopack experimental configuration to resolve Webpack/Turbopack conflict warning
Fixed React hydration error by changing disabled prop from boolean false to undefined when button is enabled
Removed disabled prop passthrough in TooltipTrigger to prevent hydration mismatch with asChild pattern
Removed disabled prop from TooltipTrigger to fix hydration error - child Button handles its own disabled state
Removed Indonesian-to-English translation requirement - agent now works directly with Indonesian instructions
Changed tsc to npx tsc in scripts to avoid PATH issues
Removed deprecated nodeMiddleware from experimental config (Next.js 15.5 no longer supports it)
